hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Map# and #a Hookshot#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Market## has #4# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Right

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Piece of the Triforce#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Piece of the Triforce#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that @ deserves a hug. Everyone does!

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #2# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Stone of Agony# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.
